thread.title: Emirate's Sheikh Sultan bin Zayed named ‘Man of the Arab Heritage’ 2015Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Emirate's Sheikh Sultan bin Zayed named ‘Man of the Arab Heritage’ 2015Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Emirate's Sheikh Sultan bin Zayed named ‘Man of the Arab Heritage’ 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Emirate’s Sheikh Sultan bin Zayed named ‘Man of the Arab Heritage’ 2015 Published on : Tuesday, September 1, 2015
In recognition of his efforts to preserve Arab history and heritage, the Arab Centre for Tourism Media (ACTM), has named Emirate’s Sheikh Sultan bin Zayed Al Nahyan “Man of the Arab Heritage” for 2015. Sheikh Sultan bin Zayed Al Nahyan is the President’s Representative and Chairman of the Emirates Heritage Club.
Emirati businessman, Khalaf al Habtoor, won the “Best Arab Tourism Investor” award, while Mohammed Kara, from Al Ittihad newspaper, was selected as the “Best Arab Tourism Journalist.”
This was announced during the award ceremony, held today in Muscat, Oman, under the patronage of Omani Tourism Minister, Ahmed bin Nasser al Mehrizi, and in the presence of ministers, senior officials and ACTM members.
